Demo Info

Demo

Download the demo and start exploring electronics projects.

Download Demo

This game works only on Windows.

To use the in-game code editor, you should set the Arduino CLI path in the Settings Menu.

Download Arduino CLI

1. Download the Arduino CLI from the official Arduino website (Windows 64 bit)

2. Place the file somewhere in the Steam Shortcuit folder.

(Doesn't matter where you place it as long as you can find it back.)

3. [In the game - Creative Mode] Go to the Settings Menu > General > click on the "Select Arduino-CLI" button and select the Arduino CLI file.
